alert.note: Alert for Coleman; McCulloch (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS San Angelo (Central Texas San Angelo)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued January 26 at 7:14PM CST by NWS San Angelo
info.description: ...A STRONG THUNDERSTORM WILL IMPACT SOUTH CENTRAL COLEMAN AND NORTHERN MCCULLOCH COUNTIES THROUGH 800 PM CST... At 714 PM CST, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Waldrip, moving east at 35 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor hail damage to vegetation is possible. Locations impacted include... Waldrip, Placid, Lohn, Mercury, Pear Valley, Milburn, Fife, Us- 283 Near The Mcculloch-Coleman County Line, and Us- 190 Near The Mcculloch-San Saba County Line. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
